title: Candle Cove
itunes:title: Candle Cove
itunes:subtitle: The Creepypasta Anthology
description:
Does anyone remember...

***

Presented by season 2 of Darkest Night

***

Special voice work done courtesy of Jessica McEvoy, Peter Lewis, Nichole Goodnight and Dan Zappulla.

***

Sound Design by Pacific Obadiah

***

Intro/Outro by Joe Stofko

***

Music by Alex Aldea

***

Minor changes have been made to this production from the written form to account for misspellings. "Subject RE:" was also not repeated.

***

Content is available under CC BY-NC-ND


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
